Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets secured their biggest win of the year with a 124-122 home win over the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Post-Match Reflections: Denver Nuggets head coach Michael Malone praised Russell Westbrook's defensive effort, calling him a 'rockstar'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Russell Westbrook led Denver with 29 points on 10-of-15 shooting, six assists, six rebounds, and one steal.
Others: The Nuggets were without guard Jamal Murray and forward Aaron Gordon on Wednesday due to injury.
